radiographic_examinations.findings: Increased tracer uptake in the medial aspect of the right femoral shaft (SUVmax = 13.3), suggesting a recurrent osteosarcoma.
Increased tracer uptake in the medial aspect of the right femoral shaft, mimicking a local recurrence.
A faintly enhancing juxtacortical mass of 5.0 x 1.7 cm in the medial aspect of the right femoral shaft.
Imaging studies failed to demonstrate the benign nature of the lesion.
